Dear Applicant,
Re: {{ business.legalName }} - {{ business.identifier }}
The above company was authorized on {{effective_date}} to amalgamate with one or more foreign corporations to form an amalgamated foreign corporation outside of British Columbia, under section 284 of the Business Corporations Act. Please note this letter of consent expires on {{ cco_expiry_date }}.
Section 286(1) states that “the amalgamated foreign corporation must promptly file with the registrar a copy of any record issued to the amalgamated foreign corporation by the amalgamated foreign corporation’s jurisdiction to effect or confirm the amalgamation.”
Please forward a copy of this record in order to remove the above company from the corporate register in British Columbia.

Yours truly,
